name: RI_1_1_8_1_Evidence_of_Record_Entry_Transmit_Event
title: RI.1.1.8.1 Evidence of Record Entry Transmit Event (Function)
description: Maintain Evidence of Record Entry Transmit Event
purpose: Evidence of Record Entry Transmit Event includes key metadata, ensures health record integrity (and trust) and enables record audit.

statement.label: RI.1.1.8.1#01
statement.requirement: The system SHALL audit each occurrence when Record Entry content is transmitted.

statement.label: RI.1.1.8.1#02
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the organization from which Record Entry content is transmitted.

statement.label: RI.1.1.8.1#03
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the patient who is subject of Record Entry content transmitted.

statement.label: RI.1.1.8.1#04
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the user initiating transmission of Record Entry content.

statement.label: RI.1.1.8.1#05
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the system application which transmitted Record Entry content.

statement.label: RI.1.1.8.1#06
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the system application which received Record Entry content.

statement.label: RI.1.1.8.1#07
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the type of Record Event trigger (i.e., transmit).

statement.label: RI.1.1.8.1#08
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the date and time Record Entry content is transmitted.

statement.label: RI.1.1.8.1#09
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD capture identity of the location (i.e., network address) from which the Record Entry is transmitted/disclosed.

statement.label: RI.1.1.8.1#10
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the location (network address) to which the Record Entry is transmitted/disclosed.

statement.label: RI.1.1.8.1#11
statement.requirement: The system MAY capture the rationale for transmitting Record Entry content.

statement.label: RI.1.1.8.1#12
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the type of Record Entry content transmitted/disclosed (e.g., original, amended, updated data).

statement.label: RI.1.1.8.1#13
statement.requirement: The system MAY capture the data, document or other identifier for transmitted/disclosed Record Entry.

statement.label: RI.1.1.8.1#14
statement.requirement: The system MAY capture data elements for transmitted/disclosed Record Entry.

statement.label: RI.1.1.8.1#15
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture when a Record Entry transmit occurrence is known to be a disclosure, according to scope of practice, organizational policy, and/or jurisdictional law.

statement.label: RI.1.1.8.1#16
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD capture known and applicable permissions regarding Record Entry content transmitted including confidentiality codes, patient consent authorizations, privacy policy pointers.
